intro.p: Use the information given and your knowledge of trig ratios to answer the question.

content.p: You have been hired by a landscaping company to estimate the height of an old oak tree in a park. you know you are standing {{H_dist}} feet away from the base of the tree, and when you use your angle finder tool, it shows the andle of elevation to the top of the tree is {{angle}}^{\circ}. How tall is the tree? Explain how you figured it out. Show all work and give your answer rounded to two decimal places.

outtro.p: Use tan( {{angle}} ) to find the height of the tree. The tree is {{high}} feet tall.
